sentences.english: Grab your tissues and find out in this touching weeper.

sentences.english: True and touching is the most important feature of emotional expression in female singers Ci.

sentences.english: Its catchword is " the wife that invites beauty is more beautiful " .

sentences.english: When the film became very exciting, Tom and Sally would hold their breath.

sentences.english: If still alive, she must now have been in the flush and bloom of early womanhood.

sentences.english: There are some touching illusions which are, perhaps, sublime realities.

sentences.english: Liebmann. "Retailers are going to have to work very hard to create that emotional feeling again."

sentences.english: She described her experiences in Africa very movingly .
sentences.chinese: 她十分動人地描述了她在非洲的經歷。
我們更驚歎她那動人的發音。
